global.text: This is a living project in its earliest, formative stages—an invitation to co-create. You may encounter unfinished sections or broken links; these are the spaces where new voices and ideas are welcome. Thank you for your patience as this work grows.

frameworks.text: Note from the Founder: The core concepts and structure of this framework are in place, but it is currently undergoing a detailed revision to improve clarity, consistency, and alignment with our project's strategy. We appreciate your patience, and your feedback during this audit is invaluable.
frameworks.text2: Framework Evolution Notice: AUBI, Hearts & The Love Ledger. The Global Governance Frameworks is a living, evolving ecosystem. The operational mechanics of the Adaptive Universal Basic Income (AUBI) framework—particularly the Hearts currency, the Love Ledger platform, and the stabilizing role of the Hearts Treasury—have been significantly detailed and refined since this document was drafted. This document may reflect an earlier conceptual stage. For the definitive, up-to-date explanation of these systems, please consult our foundational white paper: The Currency of Care: Why Universal Basic Income Isn't Enough.
frameworks.q42025redraft: This framework is scheduled for a redraft in Q4 2025. The current drafted version does not correspond to our latest outline.
frameworks.q22026redraft: This framework is scheduled for a redraft in Q2 2026. The current drafted version does not correspond to our latest outline.

accessibility.text: The GGF is committed to global accessibility through community-led translation.
